Class Book

java.lang.Object
  Book

public class Book
extends java.lang.Object

The Book class represents exchange books. It can be either ASK book or BID book of a specific symbol. The Book class includes methods for executing a new order, for adding an order to the book, for output the state of a book, and for output the top of a book.

Author:
yixia

Constructor Summary
Book(java.lang.String symbol, BookType type)
          Constructs a new book by passing its symbol and book type
 
Method Summary
 void addOrder(NewOrderImpl myOrder)
          Add a new order to the book if it is not consumed to empty.
 void executeNewOrder(NewOrderImpl myOrder, boolean print)
          Executes a new order.
 void printState()
          Print the state of the book in the following format: price, bid/ask, size, where price is to two decimals places and size is an integer.
 void printTop()
          Print the top of the book, output the best price and its size of the book.

Constructor Detail

Book

public Book(java.lang.String symbol,
            BookType type)
Constructs a new book by passing its symbol and book type

Parameters:
symbol - symbol of the book
type - type of the book
Method Detail

executeNewOrder

public void executeNewOrder(NewOrderImpl myOrder,
                            boolean print)
Executes a new order. If it is a market order, execute it immediately until it is consumed. If it is a limit order, find the best price in the book and trade it until trade with all the order better or equal than limit price.

Parameters:
myOrder - received order
print - signal for output, true for output (runner) and false for no output (silent runner)

addOrder

public void addOrder(NewOrderImpl myOrder)
Add a new order to the book if it is not consumed to empty.

Parameters:
myOrder - received order

printState

public void printState()
Print the state of the book in the following format: price, bid/ask, size, where price is to two decimals places and size is an integer.

printTop

public void printTop()
Print the top of the book, output the best price and its size of the book.
